item.title: Home Office squandered billions on asylum hotels, MPs say
item.description: "Flawed contracts" and "incompetent delivery" left the department unable to cope with demand for asylum accommodation, a report by MPs suggests.

item.title: Romanian grooming gang jailed for raping 10 women in Dundee
item.description: The four men and one woman plied their victims with drugs at various properties in Dundee.

item.title: Academic wins payout over portrayal in Steve Coogan's Richard III film
item.description: Richard Taylor sued Steve Coogan and two production companies over his portrayal in the movie.

item.title: North Sea oil and gas firm Petrofac files for administration
item.description: The energy services provider, which had been undergoing a financial restructuring, employs about 2,000 people in Scotland.

item.title: Prisons begin extra checks after migrant sex offender released in error
item.description: The government has introduced new mandatory procedures after the accidental release of Hadush Kebatu from Chelmsford prison on Friday.
